channel.title: Saturday Night Jam
channel.itunes:author: Fuze
channel.description:
A weekly podcast of the Saturday Night Jam, live improvised jams from Detroit's modern electric jazz-rock band Fuze.
You can hear a variety of music in these weekly jam sessions from original instrumental jazz-rock to totally improvised music sessions.
channel.itunes:summary:
A weekly podcast of the Saturday Night Jam, live improvised jams from Detroit's modern electric jazz-rock band Fuze.
You can hear a variety of music in these weekly jam sessions from original instrumental jazz-rock to totally improvised music sessions.

item.title: Saturday Night Jam 05-26-2012
item.itunes:author: Fuze
item.description: This weeks jam includes 7 new improvised jams with Craig and Dave K on guitar, Dave B on electric upright bass and Joe on drums.
item.itunes:subtitle: This weeks jam has 7 new improvised jams with Dave B on his new electric upright bass.
item.itunes:summary: This weeks jam includes 7 new improvised jams with Craig and Dave K on guitar, Dave B on electric upright bass and Joe on drums.

item.title: Saturday Night Jam 04-28-2012
item.itunes:author: Fuze
item.description: This weeks jam has a number of great improvisations with Joe on drums, Dave B on bass, Craig and Dave K on guitars.
item.itunes:subtitle: This weeks jam has Craig and Dave K on guitars, Dave B on bass and Joe on drums for a set of new improvised jams.
item.itunes:summary: This weeks jam has a number of great improvisations with Joe on drums, Dave B on bass, Craig and Dave K on guitars.

item.title: Saturday Night Jam 04-07-2012
item.itunes:author: Fuze
item.description: Nine new jams with Marcus back on drums, Craig and Dave on guitar, Joe on keyboards and Ross on trumpet.
item.itunes:subtitle: A reunion jam with Marcus joining for his first jam in four months.
item.itunes:summary: Nine new jams with Marcus back on drums, Craig and Dave on guitar, Joe on keyboards and Ross on trumpet.

item.title: Saturday Night Jam 03-24-2012
item.itunes:author: Fuze
item.description: This weeks jam has lots of improvised jams with the first set featuring Dave K on Megatar, Craig on guitar, Dave B on bass, Joe on drums and Ross on harmonica and trumpet.
item.itunes:subtitle: Another jam with lots of improvisations broken up into two sets.
item.itunes:summary: This weeks jam has lots of improvised jams with the first set featuring Dave K on Megatar, Craig on guitar, Dave B on bass, Joe on drums and Ross on harmonica and trumpet.

item.title: Saturday Night Jam 03-17-2012
item.itunes:author: Fuze
item.description: Another round of improvised jams with Craig on bass and Dave on guitar, then later Dave on bass and Craig on guitar. Joe played drums and Ross played harmonica and trumpet.
item.itunes:subtitle: This weeks jam has Craig and Dave switching off on bass and guitar, Joe on drums and Ross on harmonica and trumpet.
item.itunes:summary: Another round of improvised jams with Craig on bass and Dave on guitar, then later Dave on bass and Craig on guitar. Joe played drums and Ross played harmonica and trumpet.

item.title: Saturday Night Jam 03-10-2012
item.itunes:author: Fuze
item.description: Nine new imrpvosed jams from the Saturday Night Jam session held on 03-10-2012. This features Craig and Dave K on guitar, Dave B on bass and Joe on drums.
item.itunes:subtitle: A great set of fresh improvised jams from Fuze with Craig and Dave K on guitar, Dave B on bass and Joe on drums.
item.itunes:summary: Nine new imrpvosed jams from the Saturday Night Jam session held on 03-10-2012. This features Craig and Dave K on guitar, Dave B on bass and Joe on drums.

item.title: Saturday Night Jam 11-14-2009
item.itunes:author: Fuze
item.description: This weeks podcast features Dave on the Megatar, Joe on Keys and Bass and Marcus on drums. The new studio is setup for the Saturday Night Jams so expect more episodes in the coming weeks.
item.itunes:subtitle: After a long break and a move to a new studio, Fuze is back to publishing the Saturday Night Jam Podcast.
item.itunes:summary: This weeks podcast features Dave on the Megatar, Joe on Keys and Bass and Marcus on drums. The new studio is setup for the Saturday Night Jams so expect more episodes in the coming weeks.
item.itunes:keywords: jams, live, music, fusion, jazz, rock, detroit, fuze, improvised
